start: ^I didn't know if you were going to come...

c-0: ^Amy: I didn't know if you were going to come...
c-1: ^Amy: Just like we used to do...
^Ethan: Sometimes I wonder what happened to us

neutral1: ^Ethan: I wasn't sure if I should come either, but here I am.
^I didn't expect you to do it for me
^Do you remember the first time you came to this couch?

c-0: ^Amy: I'm glad you did, I think there are things to talk about.
^Ethan: Although I don't know if we're too late to talk...
c-1: ^Amy: I didn't expect you to do it for me
^Amy: Perhaps you came out of pity
^Ethan: It's not pity, but I wouldn't know what it is, exactly....
^Amy: Then you don't know why you're here either...
^Amy: That scares me more than pity.
^Ethan: I couldn't not be here, even if I don't know what else to say.
c-2: ^Amy: Do you remember the first time you came to this couch?

distance1: ^I don't think there is anything left to say...
^You don't seem to want to stay and you don't want to leave either.

c-0: ^Amy: I don't think there is anything left to say...
c-1: ^Amy: It's just that... I'm having a hard time seeing your motivation.
^Amy: You don't seem to want to stay and you don't want to leave either.

confution: ^Ethan: Do you want me to go?

c-0: ^Amy: Yes, it's not worth it to keep hurting each other.
c-1: ^Amy: I don't know if I want you to leave or stay different...

neutral2: ^We were late for a lot of things

c-0: ^Amy: We were late for a lot of things
^Amy: And talking was never our strength.
^Ethan: Maybe that's why we're here, to try one last time.
^Amy: I don't know if this will make a difference
^Amy: But maybe it can help me to let go of what was hurting.
^Ethan: And me to look back without so much noise
^Ethan: At least now... it hurts differently.
c-1: ^Amy: Maybe so, but I don't want to be left in doubt.
^Ethan: So let's not keep quiet today

realism1: ^Why did you walk away so far without saying anything?

c-0: ^Amy: Why did you walk away so far without saying anything?
^Ethan: Because I didn't know how to stay without breaking you more
c-1: ^Ethan: Yes, but I got lost on the way, I forgot who I was.
c-2: ^Amy: Sometimes I thought about it, and I can't stay in doubt.
^Ethan: No, there was no one else.
^Ethan: But for you to ask... that really hurts me.
^Ethan: If you doubt me, it's because I failed in something
^Ethan: And I'm sorry I made you stop feeling safe with me.
^Amy: I just needed to know, thank you

pain1: ^I didn't need you to be perfect
^Then maybe you were right to leave

c-0: ^Amy: I didn't need you to be perfect, I just didn't need you to disappear quietly.
^Ethan: And I needed you to see me, even if I didn't know how to show myself.
^Amy: We didn't talk when we had the time, but at least we talked about it
^Ethan: If we can't go back, at least we can close this chapter well.
c-1: ^Amy: Then maybe you were right to leave, at least a part of me was left whole.
^Ethan: I will never forgive myself for having broken the other part.

nostalgia1: ^Ethan: It almost seems like another life
^Sometimes I ask myself the same question
^Sure, the other life you always wanted
^There were days when I felt we were working, others when we were not.

c-0: ^Amy: Sometimes I ask myself the same question
^Amy: And I think I didn't know how to show it.
c-1: ^Amy: Sure, the other life you always wanted
c-2: ^Amy: There were days when I felt we were working, others when we were not.

nostalgia2: ^Ethan: It almost seems like another life
^Sure, the other life you always wanted
^There were days when I felt we were working, others when we were not.

c-0: ^Amy: Sometimes I think about what happened to us and how I failed the relationship..
c-1: ^Amy: Sure, the other life you always wanted
c-2: ^Amy: There were days when I felt we were working, others when we were not.

insecurity1: ^Ethan: It was hard to do if I didn't know if you wanted me there.
^Maybe neither of us knew how to stay
^It wasn't that I didn't love you.

c-0: ^Amy: Maybe neither of us knew how to stay and that's why we are now so broken...
^Ethan: Do you think it's time to end it? Before it hurts more?
c-1: ^Amy: It wasn't that I didn't love you, it was that I didn't know how to ask you to stay.

vulnerability1: ^I don't wat to keep quiet anymore
^And now I don't know if there's still something to talk about...

c-0: ^Amy: I don't know if it's too late, but I don't want to keep quiet anymore.
^Ethan: Then don't. What if we talk for real?
c-1: ^Amy: And now I don't know if there's still something to talk about...
^Ethan: Maybe not, but at least we're talking about it now.

acceptance1: ^Ethan: I think we both fail in that
^Do you think we would be in a different place if we had talked earlier?
^So maybe we were just two people who didn't know how to take better care of ourselves.

c-0: ^Amy We would be in a different place if we had talked earlier?
^Ethan: I don't know. But I would have liked to know.
c-1: ^Amy: So maybe we were just two people who didn't know how to take better care of ourselves.
^Ethan: Even if it hurts, that was our reality...

contradiction1: ^It is the reality that we have lived for a long time
^Sometimes I wish your life with me was enough
^If it's a subject you bring up so much, there must be some truth to it.

c-0: ^Amy: It is the reality that we have lived for a long time
^Ethan: That's your reality! Not the reality of both of us
c-1: ^Amy: You know what? Sometimes I wish your life with me was enough
^Ethan: But it seems I wasn't invited into your plans.
c-2: ^Amy: If it's a subject you bring up so much, there must be some truth to it.
^Ethan: Wow... You really think that about me...
^Ethan: Do you really think that...? You know what? I don't think this is going anywhere.
^Ethan: At this point, I think it is no longer useful to talk or fight.

c-0: ^Amy: My reality? Yours was to keep quiet about everything
^Amy: And then pretend that you were here
^Ethan: And yours was to say everything was fine
^Ethan: And then treating me like I was in the way.
^Ethan: You're not the only one who put up with things, Amy.
^Ethan: But your stuff was always more important, wasn't it?
c-1: ^Amy: You know what? This is getting nowhere...
^Amy: You've made your decision, and I'm not in it.

resignation1: ^That's the way it's felt for a long time.

c-0: ^Amy: Maybe, but that's the way it's felt for a long time.
c-1: ^Amy: No need to say it, just don't keep pretending you don't know...
